CLAF by Lovely MindBand

  • CLAF by Lovely MindBand
  • 3160104704@zju.edu.com.cn
  • ryf1123

CLAF is a project aiming at generating coherent symbolic polyphonic music by the state of the art technology. We posts some model descreption, experiment result as well as analysis, and most importantly, the selected best sample and unselected samples (for further analysis) both in audio and piano roll graphs.
